abstract: Visible Past is a cross-platform, scalable research and learning environment. Its primary aim is to help students and scholars experience and communicate with fully immersive, historically accurate models of past geographic realities or to relate information to specific real geographic locations. It also includes location-aware capabilities and in the future will include attention-aware learning scenario.
article_title: Visible Past: A location and attention aware learning and discovery environment for digital humanities
publisher: Edinburgh University Press  22 George Square, Edinburgh EH8 9LF UK
journal_title: International Journal of Humanities and Arts Computing
